sentence.Network_en: He silenced the whisperings which connected her, untruly and unfairly, with his separation from his wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 他平息了那些说他因与她有染而离开妻子的虚假而又不公平的闲言碎语.

sentences.sentence: "he silenced the whisperings which connected her, untruly and unfairly, with his separation from his wife"
